What is Data Vis?

data + visualization

27 Nov 2020

I often get asked – what is data vis? And often I answer with: “Well, it’s visualizing data. “ Incredibly helpful. I know.

So, inspired by the very unhelpful patent images of the shape of the internet found by Noah Veltman, I have found equally unhelpful images of data visualizations. Enjoy!

strange white man from the 50s reads tablet

cute screens talk business to one another

vis can make you smile

aol man gets webcam
